18:59.quote_last: in the evening she had died, and her frantic husband had made a frightful scene in his efforts to kill West, whom he wildly blamed for not saving her life. Friends had held him when he drew a stiletto, but West departed amidst his inhuman shrieks, curses, and oaths of vengeance
18:59.title: Herbert West - Reanimator
18:59.author: H. P. Lovecraft
